title: COME TAKE YOUR THRONE
bible_ref: ...your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God. 1 Cor 6:19
verses: I have prepared my heart for you;=O Lord, come take your Throne. x2=Nothing must come within my soul,=Nothing must break into my thoughts,=No one must rise to take your place;=O Lord, come take your throne.
I have reserved my lifetime for you;=O Lord, come take control. X2=My life must serve your purpose Lord,=Living for you and dying to self,=My all I give your will to serve;=O Lord, come take control.

I have released my whole being to you;=O Lord, come take your own x2=My heart, my soul and body, Lord!=Once and for all and not bit by bit;=I lay them all on the altar for you;=O Lord, come take your own.
I have referred my life's end to you,=Dear Lord, then take me home x2=To see Thy face is all I ask=My labour here must not be in vain=My hope, my joy is to reign with you=O may I make it home.
